description.name: Easy Favicon
description.tagline: Set favicons for client and admin areas without coding.
description.long: No programming skills are needed to add and change favicon at your WHMCS website. Just install the module, upload your favorite icons and set them as favicons in one click.
features: download in one click (no registration, account verification and etc.);
separate favicons for client area and admin area;
it supports icons in .ico format, which may contains several icons of different sizes (for different devices) inside one file;
after module deactivation all setting return to initial state.
